value.title: Alice Merchant: Clan Agitator
value.text: The first time you make a successful run on Archives each turn, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ.

value.title: Edward Kim: Humanity's Hammer
value.text: Trash the first operation you access each turn at no cost.

value.title: Esâ Afontov: Eco-Insurrectionist
value.text: The first time each turn you suffer core damage, you may draw 1 card and sabotage 2. (The Corp trashes 2 cards of their choice from HQ and/or the top of R&D.)

value.title: Freedom Khumalo: Crypto-Anarchist
value.text: Access → Any X virus counters: Trash the non-agenda card you are accessing. X is equal to that card's rez or play cost. Use this ability only once per turn.

value.title: Hoshiko Shiro: Untold Protagonist
value.text:
When your turn ends, if you accessed a card this turn, gain 2[credit] and flip this identity.
Flip side:
When your turn begins, draw 1 card and lose 1[credit].
When your turn ends, if you did not access any cards this turn, flip this identity.

value.title: Nathaniel "Gnat" Hall: One-of-a-Kind
value.text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have 2 or fewer cards in your grip.

value.title: Noise: Hacker Extraordinaire
value.text: Whenever you install a virus program, the Corp trashes the top card of R&D.

value.title: Null: Whistleblower
value.text: Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may trash 1 card from your grip. If you do, that ice has -2 strength for the remainder of this run.

value.title: Omar Keung: Conspiracy Theorist
value.text: [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ or R&D for the remainder of that run. Use this ability only once per turn.

value.title: Quetzal: Free Spirit
value.text: 0[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. Use this ability only once per turn.

value.title: Reina Roja: Freedom Fighter
value.text: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1[credit] more to rez.

value.title: René "Loup" Arcemont: Party Animal
value.text: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.

value.title: Ryō "Phoenix" Ōno: Out of the Ashes
